operation

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • operation.Operation

  • public class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Operation
    Validates the type and arguments of a given operation and works as an interface betwen the arena and a RVM.
    Author:
    Karina Suemi, Renato Cordeiro, Vin√≠cius Silva
